column8: Summary1. DAP Lim Lip Eng final notice to Johnson Lee, refund the capital to investors within 5 working days or they will report to police to catch Johnson Lee2. DAP Lim Lip Eng claims many JJPTR investors had approach him to help them 3. DAP Lim Lip Eng said if JJPTR not ponzi scheme, JJPTR should refund to investors immediately4. About Johnson Lee say he is still in Malaysia, DAP Lim Lip Eng say the statement  is not logic just like the hacking statement. http://www.chinapress.com.my/20170502/%E6%...9C%AC%E9%87%91/
omg.are /k will butthurt with dap pulak?
